Description:
Improvement notice 1
Notice reference number - IN/PJW/AQU/250222/01

You have failed to properly plan Work at Height (WAH) resulting in numerous risks of falls in the workplace and you have also failed to consider the selection of appropriate equipment to minimise risks from work at height.

Improvement notice 2
Notice reference number - IN/PJW/AQU/250222/02

You have failed to appoint one or more competent persons to assist you in undertaking the measures that you would need to take to comply with the requirements and prohibitions placed on you by the relevant
health and safety legislation.
